heading: Collection of data:
description: We do not store message content except for number of boosts you have.
We do not log/track messages sent by you except for commands (starting with bot prefix).
Right now, we tracks every boost if bot has read messages access to system channel.

heading: Retention of data:
description: All the data is stored with proper security precautions but we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
Data will be retained only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy.
You can let us know in suppoert server if you don't want your boost data to be stored.

heading: Information collected:
description: Your bot settings like greet channel id, auto/custom role(s) ids etc..
Your boost data (time & number of boosts) for better visibility of stats to server staff.

heading: Use of data:
description: All the data that is stored does not contain any personal data like your email or IP.
The data is only used for basic functionality of bot and allowing server staff to monitor/log boosts.
Our Service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site.

heading: Contact us
description: If you have any questions about our Terms, please feed free to reach out to our discord support server
